column1: Narrator : An old an battered ship flying a red flag is spotted. Before the crew of NOMBATEAU can do anything, a few of its sailors are on your deck!
Narrator : A few sailors show up on the deck.
column3: OtherSpeak : Well well, did you forget about us, you scallywags?

column1: OtherSpeak : Here is the deal : a third of your gold or you’re done for!
Choice : Curse ye, ye old salty kraken, here…(trade)
column3: Choice : I’d sooner die than give yer lot a single shiny coin, ye wretches! (attack)
column4: Choice : It’s not much, but it's all we have.
OtherSpeak : That’s fine, we’ll take it... and kill you next!

column2: OtherSpeak : Lads, let’s get that bastard!

column1: OtherSpeak : Well what are you still doing here?
OtherSpeak : You want us to take more of your gold?

column4: PlayerSpeak : Some food, miraculously still edible!
